original_text: The Lord did all the good things that he had promised to do for the people of Israel. He did not fail to do anything that he had promised. The Lord did all the good things that he had promised to do for the people of Israel. He did not fail to do anything that he had promised.
korean_text: 여호와께서 이스라엘 족속에게 말씀하신 선한 말씀이 하나도 남음이 없이 다 응하였더라

sentences.original_text: The Lord did all the good things
that he had promised to do
He did not fail to do anything
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 어떤 것도 행하는 데 실패하지 않았다

sentences.original_text: The Lord did all the good things
that he had promised to do
He did not fail to do anything
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 어떤 것도 행하는 데 실패하지 않았다
